Description: User forgot password and was locked out. Reset via phone.
Request to install Adobe Photoshop on new marketing laptop. License approved.
VPN access is failing for multiple users in the engineering department. Error code 789. Unable to access critical servers.
Professor's monitor is flickering. Replaced the VGA cable.
Salesforce plugin for Outlook is crashing. Reinstalled the plugin and cleared cache.
Cannot access the new HR portal after the update. Getting a permissions error.
User needs access to the shared marketing drive. Permissions granted.
The primary DNS server is unresponsive. Multiple internal applications are inaccessible. This is affecting a critical project deadline.
New sales team member needs a laptop provisioned. Standard setup completed.
Reports of extremely slow Wi-Fi speeds across the entire 3rd floor of the science building. Investigating potential rogue access point.
Requesting a license for Canva Pro for the social media team.
Password reset required for Git repository access.
The main projector in lecture hall B is not turning on. Class is in one hour.
User is unable to print from their new laptop to the HR department printer. Driver issue suspected.
Account locked due to too many failed login attempts. Unlocked.
MATLAB simulation is crashing with a memory allocation error on a high-performance workstation. Need to investigate system logs.
User reports that their laptop battery is draining much faster than usual.
Faculty member needs email forwarding set up for their sabbatical.
A user in the sales department is unable to connect to the corporate Wi-Fi. Their device is not picking up the SSID.
Clarification needed on using the new time-tracking software. Sent user the link to the knowledge base article.
Campus-wide outage of the authentication server. No one can log into any university systems. All hands on deck.
Request for an ergonomic mouse and keyboard for a user with wrist pain.
